input.sentences: today i got to interview with a reporter about fishing .
fishing is one of my favorite things to do .
i often go with the family and we all fish together .
today was a good day . i caught lots of fish .
i think i did a pretty good interview as well .
output.sentences: This reporter did a live interview of the sport of fishing.
Fishing is a local favorite thing to do.
This entire net of fish could feed a family!
A ton of fish were caught that day.
It was a pretty good interview considering fish were caught.
